text: Cardi B ( Photo : Theo Wargo / Getty Images ) To some extent, we all knew kinda what to expect from the music world in 2018. Beyonce would continue to reign – which she most certainly did, with her Coachella headlining performance, On The Run II tour with Jay - Z and her surprise new album. Drake would have a big summer, like he has the past few years – and that also came true, with his various singles from his “ Scorpion ” album ruling the airwaves this summer into fall. And, Kanye West would continue to be unpredictable – which definitely happened, from his roller coaster of political involvement to his musical output, including his seven - song album “ Ye ” and his surprise hit single “ I Love It ” with Lil Pump.
